result.title: An USACO probem
result.content:
Recently I've been trying to solve a bronze USACO problem ( The problem is exploration â€” the first one at this site: http://tjsct.wikidot.com/usaco-nov07-bronze ).

After understading what do they ask, I now could easily solve it. But what if the statement changes to finding the maximum point we can reach, will there be any solutions?

Thanks in advance :D

P/s: sorry if my english are poor.
